tags.name: input-root
tags.description: A custom input element that provides enhanced input functionality. Consists of a root element that contains a label and value.

attributes.name: x-name
attributes.description: The name of the input, used in form submissions and change events.

tags.name: input-value
tags.description: The editable value container for the input element. Supports single-line text input.

attributes.name: contenteditable
attributes.description: Always set to 'true' to enable text editing.

attributes.name: role
attributes.description: ARIA role, always set to 'textbox' for accessibility.

attributes.name: aria-multiline
attributes.description: ARIA attribute indicating this is a single-line input.

tags.name: input-label
tags.description: The label element for the input. Clicking it focuses the input value element.
